meanings: bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)
to fasten with a pin or clip
to stick in; to insert (in order to hinder movement)
(noun suffix) category (e.g. 性别, 派别)
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}
(Taiwan pr. [bì] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)
classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chū] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
to inlay with gold or silver
related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to leave for; to go to
to (a place); until (a time); up to (a point)
(verb complement indicating arriving at a place or reaching a point)
to press charges; to file a complaint
to tell; to inform; to let know
classifier used to indicate number of people
(slang) service provider for Shadowsocks or similar software for circumventing Internet censorship
to present (sb for a job etc)
classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
(after a suppositional clause) in that case; then
(after a clause of action) as soon as; immediately after
(same as 就是[jiù shì]) merely; nothing else but; simply; just; precisely; exactly
as much as; as many as
(often followed by 着) taking advantage of
(pattern: 就[jiù] ... 也[yě] ...) even if ... still ...
(pattern: 不[bù] ... 就[jiù] ...) if not ... then must be ...
to think that ...; to feel that ...
tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jīn] (old)
classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology
you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[nǐ])
classifier for groups, batches, business transactions
to send; to deliver; to transmit
to accompany; to go along with
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xīn jiāng] or Singapore 新加坡[Xīn jiā pō]
to want; to need; to ask for
(literary) particle having functions similar to 啊[a]
then (after sth, and not until then)
no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[yě] or 都[dōu] for emphasis)
aspect particle indicating action in progress or ongoing state
right in the middle of (doing sth)
to know; to become aware of
away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[chè zǒu])

by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bèi])
